system.description:
At 7th level, you learn how to temporarily take on the form of an elemental. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.95tar7xr3hdp0o92]{Polymorph} on yourself without expending any spell points, except only to turn into an air, earth, fire, or water elemental, matching your element. Once you use this ability, you must complete a long rest before you can use it again. While transformed this way, you can only cast spells matching the element whose form you have taken, and you can use your elemental blast and command elements abilities.

At 15th level, you can instead turn into a giant air, earth, fire, or water elemental.
